column5: Some footage from 2011  Thanks for everyone who put up with me and helped me... never stop learning !  Good luck to everyone in 2012 !  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qXA_YoegONc
Awesome Vid ! Some great moments to remember for 2011  Tite lines for the new years
Nice vid James, I will see you in the  spring. Have a great 2012
I just watched "Bass up in 2011 " and laughed my ass off. Minn Chota, They are on the 6 inch not the 12 ! Thats classic stuff, very funny guys. An amazing season for you guys !
Thanks guys... we are really lucky. We have one of the best fisheries in Ontario - Lake Erie and the Niagara river. So I will give most of the credit to the fish gods on this one hahaha
